amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to construct any new Department of Defense facility at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, or to expand any existing Department of Defense facility at such Naval Station.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 70 printed in House Report 113-170 to prevent further construction or expansion of existing facilities at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A061) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 237 (Roll no. 409).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A061) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 237 (Roll no. 409).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A061) offered by Mr. Nadler.
